headline.main: GAYDA AGAIN CHARGES U.S. SUBMARINE RAIDS; Warns Tokyo Against Moves of Washington and London

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 12 -- Virginio Gayda again accuses the United States of operating submarines against Italian shipping in the Mediterranean and seizes on British Prime Minister Winston Churchill's statement that a large part of the American fleet is already at war against the Axis to point out to Japan that there is nothing left of American neutrality.
abstract: V Gayda on U S participation

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
